mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sf_id AS "sfId", a.th_name AS "thName", a.huhao AS "huhao", a.h_relation AS "hRelation", a.province AS "province", a.jc_date AS "jcDate", a.lx_tel AS "lxTel", a.tel_station AS "telStation", a.ptype AS "ptype", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.resp_area AS "respArea", a.phone AS "phone", a.habitation AS "habitation", a.create_date AS "createDate"

a.id AS "id", a.sf_id AS "sfId", a.th_name AS "thName", a.huhao AS "huhao", a.h_relation AS "hRelation", a.province AS "province", a.jc_date AS "jcDate", a.lx_tel AS "lxTel", a.tel_station AS "telStation", a.ptype AS "ptype", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.resp_area AS "respArea", a.phone AS "phone", a.habitation AS "habitation", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_home( id, sf_id, th_name, huhao, h_relation, province, jc_date, lx_tel, tel_station, ptype, of_shizhou, of_quxian, resp_area, phone, habitation, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sfId}, #{thName}, #{huhao}, #{hRelation}, #{province}, #{jcDate}, #{lxTel}, #{telStation}, #{ptype}, #{ofShizhou}, #{ofQuxian}, #{respArea}, #{phone}, #{habitation}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE p_home SET sf_id = #{sfId}, th_name = #{thName}, huhao = #{huhao}, h_relation = #{hRelation}, province = #{province}, jc_date = #{jcDate}, lx_tel = #{lxTel}, tel_station = #{telStation}, ptype = #{ptype}, of_shizhou = #{ofShizhou}, of_quxian = #{ofQuxian}, resp_area = #{respArea}, phone = #{phone}, habitation = #{habitation} WHERE id = #{id}
